Room.Name: Appleton Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Appleton Road, running diagonally through town.
Room.LongDescription: Appleton is one of the strange, diagonal roads which travels northwest and southeast from here. To the northwest, Appleton Road heads towards the Allisk Circle. Appleton heads southeast towards the city walls in the southeastern quadrant of town. Between the road is the Circle-Bar Cattle Ranch and the Slaughterhouse. There is a small trickle of blood running out from the Slaughterhouse on the west side of the road.
